title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 43.3 - Prevailing class ii price
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 43.3 - Prevailing class ii price

State Regulations

The prevailing class II price for the second preceding
month for purposes of making partial payment for milk pursuant to section
258-b(2)(a) of the law shall be the class II or equivalent milk price announced
for the applicable Federal or State milk marketing order. A milk dealer not
subject to a Federal or State milk marketing order shall make partial payment
at not less than the class II price announced for the New York - New Jersey
milk marketing order (Parts 19 and 20 of this Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
43.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
